question: As per the Forbes magazine, who is the highest paid female athlete of the world, as of May 2020?
explanation:
According to the Forbes magazine, Japanese tennis star Naomi Osaka has become the highest paid female athlete in the world.
The tennis star, who earned $37.4 million in the last 12 months from prize money and endorsements replaced American veteran sports star Serena Williams. Osaka also created an all-time earnings record by a female athlete in a single year. The record was previously held by another tennis legend Maria Sharapova.
